title: Welcome to Your New Lab Website!
text: This is an example post to demonstrate how news items and blog posts work in your Quarto website. You can delete this file once you’ve created your own posts.

title: Welcome to Your New Lab Website!
section: How to Create a New Post
text:
How to Create a New Post

Create a new file in the posts/ folder
Name it using the format: YYYY-MM-DD-short-title.qmd
Copy the YAML header from this file and update the fields
Write your content using Markdown

title: Welcome to Your New Lab Website!
text:
Markdown Formatting Examples
Here are some common formatting options:

Text Formatting

Bold text using **text**
Italic text using *text*
Links using [text](url)



Images
To add an image, place it in your images/ folder and reference it:
![Description](images/your-image.jpg)


Code
For inline code use backticks: like this
For code blocks:
# Example Python code
def hello():
    print("Hello, world!")


Lists
Bullet points:

First item
Second item
Third item

Numbered lists:

First step
Second step
Third step

title: Welcome to Your New Lab Website!
text:
Example Announcements
Here are some types of posts you might create:

New Publication: “Our paper on [topic] was published in [Journal]”
Grant Award: “We received funding from [Agency] for [Project]”
New Lab Member: “Welcome [Name] who joins us as a [Position]”
Conference Presentation: “[Name] presented at [Conference]”
Graduation: “Congratulations to [Name] on defending their thesis!”


Remember to delete this example post and create your own content!
